Name: Argo MOLE Carbon
Description:
Manufacturer: Argo Astronautics
Focus: Mining

Argo’s iconic multi-operator laser extractor, more commonly referred to as the MOLE, lets you work faster and more effectively than ever before, thanks to its patented trilateral mining system. Three independently controlled articulated extraction stations allow for maximum power and near-limitless versatility. The Carbon Edition offers the MOLE's revered mining ability with a distinctive all-black finish.
